2010.context: Sprinklr, Inc. is a unified customer experience management platform focused on social media management, customer care, and marketing. Founded for social media management.

competitors.name: Hootsuite
competitors.notes: Founded 2008, veteran in social media management

competitors.name: Sprout Social
competitors.notes: Founded 2010, same year as Sprinklr

competitors.name: AgoraPulse
competitors.notes: Founded 2010 in Paris, emerging competitor

2015.query: Sprinklr competitors 2015 enterprise social media management
2015.context: Sprinklr, Inc. is a unified customer experience management platform focused on social media management, customer care, and marketing. Unified CXM platform. Large enterprise focus.

competitors.name: Hootsuite
competitors.notes: Founded in 2008, Hootsuite was the most widely-used social media management platform, popular with both SMBs and enterprises. In 2015, Hootsuite was Sprinklr's primary competitor in the enterprise segment, though generally seen as more SMB-focused.

competitors.name: Salesforce Social Studio (Radian6)
competitors.notes: Part of Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Social Studio (evolved from Radian6 acquisition) provided enterprise social media management integrated with Salesforce's CRM and marketing automation platform.

competitors.name: Adobe Social (part of Marketing Cloud)
competitors.notes: Adobe's social media management solution integrated within Adobe Marketing Cloud, competing in the enterprise marketing technology space.

competitors.name: Sprout Social
competitors.notes: Founded in 2010, Sprout Social was a growing player offering social media management with strong analytics and engagement features, targeting mid-market and growing enterprises.

competitors.name: Spredfast
competitors.notes: Enterprise social media management and content marketing platform, competing directly with Sprinklr in the enterprise segment (later merged with Lithium to form Khoros).

competitors.name: Lithium Technologies
competitors.notes: Social customer experience platform offering community management and social media tools for enterprises, strong in customer community and engagement.

competitors.name: Oracle Social Cloud
competitors.notes: Part of Oracle's Marketing Cloud suite, providing enterprise social media marketing and monitoring capabilities.

2025.context: Sprinklr, Inc. is a unified customer experience management platform focused on social media management, customer care, and marketing. CXM platform leader. Competing with Salesforce, Adobe.

competitors.name: Salesforce Marketing Cloud
competitors.notes: Enterprise marketing automation with social and customer service capabilities

competitors.name: Sprout Social
competitors.notes: Social media management and analytics platform

competitors.name: Hootsuite

competitors.name: Khoros (Spredfast + Lithium)
competitors.notes: Social media and community management platform

competitors.name: Qualtrics

competitors.name: Medallia

competitors.name: NICE CXone

mentionedBy.name: Sprout Social Inc.

mentionedBy.name: Sprout Social Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Enterprise-focused social media management platform serving large organizations. While in a different market segment, Sprinklr competed for larger Sprout Social customers as they scaled.

mentionedBy.name: Sprout Social Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: AI-powered customer experience management platform with four main products: Sprinklr Service, Social, Insights, and Marketing

mentionedBy.name: Sprout Social Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Designed for large enterprises with extensive social media needs, more scalable and customizable than Sprout Social
